column2: "Iyi nye dza Amos a ɔwɔ Tekoa nguanhwɛfo mu no hunii wɔ Israel ho wɔ Judahen Uzia ber do
column3: na Israelhen Jeroboam a ɔyɛ Joas ne ba no ber do
column4: mfe ebien ansaana asaasewosow no reba no."
na oefi Jerusalɛm ama ne ndze do; na nguanhwɛfo no hɔn nguandzidzibea bedzi awerɛhow
